title: T205 Matty SGC A For Trade
author: soxinseven

posts.post_title: T205 Matty SGC A For Trade
posts.post_content:
I have a T205 Matty that I would like to trade for E94s that I don't have. If I can't trade it, I'll put a price on it. The card has been trimmed on the bottom border but has great eye appeal. Matty also has two sets of eyes. Price is SOLD.
                                          Thanks,
                                            Steve
